PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
b5447515b79061742504d1d421e056&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681983
2/2/20 23&20


Worked on the O2A application.
Responsibility is to handle orders created by front end users (CRM), handling critical
emails from clients.
Opening defects and fixing them with the concerned team.
Actively involved in the design, architecture, and development of the data model and user interface objects.
Worked on SLA tickets. Knowledge of Business Process Service, Order management
System and Customer Relationship Management like Amdocs products   OMS, CRM, SRM, AR.
Monitoring and resolving production file system and table space issues.
Enhancement of existing shell scripts.
Assisted tools team by providing them SQL blocks for an order to fall out automation.
Project analysis over SQL server environment.
*worked on QlikView to create dashboards
